Name: Daemonsgate
About the game: Do you feel the darkness approaching? A mysterious and calamitous scourge of daemons has risen from the southern mountains, devastating the lands of Elsopea and vanishing its populations. Now, the great city of Tormis is under siege! Captain Gustavus, a loyal agent of the king of Tormis, must set out on a quest over land and sea to find a rumored sage who may hold key secrets to uncover the sinister cause of the daemon invasion and bring it to an end! Experience Imagitec Design’s ambitious and innovative RPG, breathtaking in scope at over 150 hours of play time. Daemonsgate will draw you in with its richly detailed world, fascinating character interactions, and epic story. Explore a vast land beautifully illustrated through more than 3,000 travel screens. Interact with and discover the personalities of Hestor’s many inhabitants using a conversation system with an impressive dictionary of over 70,000 words. Recruit allies and harness their abilities, skills, and three kinds of magic to fight against hordes of enemies. Immerse yourself in the epic and atmospheric soundtrack.
